required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Qualitative Interview Study Regarding Dentists' Repair Behaviour
clinical_study.official_title: Qualitative Interview Study Regarding Dentists' Repair Behaviour

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the present study is to determine dentists' barriers and facilitators for performing repairs on partially defective dental restorations.

detailed_description.textblock: Potential barriers and facilitators for treating partially defective dental restorations by repair instead of complete replacement are going to be assessed by interviewing German dentists.

arm_group.description: Dentists who are working in dental offices in Germany

study_pop.textblock: Dentists who are working in dental offices in Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Dentists who are working in dental offices in Germany and who are able to give written consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Non-fulfillment of the inclusion criteria
- Lack of capacity to consent
- No German language skills in written and spoken language

overall_official.last_name: Philipp Kanzow, Dr. med. dent., MBA
overall_official.affiliation: Dept. of Prev. Dentistry, Periodontology and Cariology, University Medical Center Göttingen, Germany

overall_contact.last_name: Philipp Kanzow, Dr. med. dent., MBA

overall_contact_backup.last_name: Annette Wiegand, Prof. Dr. med. dent.

reference.citation: Kanzow P, Hoffmann R, Tschammler C, Kruppa J, Rödig T, Wiegand A. Attitudes, practice, and experience of German dentists regarding repair restorations. Clin Oral Investig. 2017 May;21(4):1087-1093. doi: 10.1007/s00784-016-1859-3. Epub 2016 Jun 2.

Kanzow P, Dieckmann P, Hausdörfer T, Attin T, Wiegand A, Wegehaupt FJ. Repair restorations: Questionnaire survey among dentists in the Canton of Zurich, Switzerland. Swiss Dent J. 2017;127(4):300-311. English, German.
Kanzow P, Wiegand A, Schwendicke F. Cost-effectiveness of repairing versus replacing composite or amalgam restorations. J Dent. 2016 Nov;54:41-47. doi: 10.1016/j.jdent.2016.08.008. Epub 2016 Aug 26.

responsible_party.investigator_full_name: Philipp Kanzow, Dr. med. dent., MBA
